title: Electric utilities face policy uncertainty as large-load demand accelerates
description: Utility industry leaders at DTECH 2026 explored how federal actions, tariffs and data center demand are complicating grid planning.
content: Utility industry leaders at DTECH 2026 explored how federal actions, tariffs and data center demand are complicating grid planning.
